item.description: About Me I am a computational ecologist by training and a data visualization designer by heart with more than 9 years of hypothesis-driven research experience and strong skills in data wrangling, statistical analysis, model development and data visualization. I am working as a scientific researcher (PostDoc) in the Department “Ecological Dynamics” at the Leibniz Institute for Zoo and Wildlife Research (IZW) in Berlin, Germany. Since the beginning of 2002 I have also been working successfully as a self-employed designer, consultant and workshop instructor in the fields of data visualization and reproducible analysis.

A selection of data visualizations have produced for personal projects and as challenge contributions using the {ggplot2} package in the programming language R. All visualizations are the result of the code without any post-processing. #TidyTuesday Contributions #30DayMapChallenge Contributions #MakeoverMonday Contributions #SWDchallenge Contributions RStudio Table Contest 2020 You need a visualization?
